title: Chapter 2: Arithmetic Expressions
content: Understanding arithmetic expressions and order of operations (BODMAS). Learn to evaluate expressions step by step.
fullContent:
Understanding arithmetic expressions and order of operations (BODMAS). Learn to evaluate expressions step by step.

Order of Operations:
â€¢ Brackets first
â€¢ Orders (powers and roots)
â€¢ Division and Multiplication
â€¢ Addition and Subtraction

Examples:
â€¢ 8 + 4 Ã— 3 = 8 + 12 = 20
â€¢ 15 - (6 + 2) = 15 - 8 = 7
â€¢ 5 Ã— (10 + 3) = 5 Ã— 13 = 65

title: Chapter 3: History of Number Systems
content: Explore the historical development of number systems from ancient civilizations to modern mathematics.
fullContent:
Explore the historical development of number systems from ancient civilizations to modern mathematics.

Ancient Number Systems:
â€¢ Babylonian (base 60)
â€¢ Egyptian hieroglyphics
â€¢ Roman numerals
â€¢ Mayan system

Modern Development:
â€¢ Hindu-Arabic numerals
â€¢ Decimal system
â€¢ Binary and hexadecimal
â€¢ Mathematical notation

title: Chapter 4: Quadrilaterals
content: Study of quadrilaterals and their properties. Learn about different types of four-sided polygons.
fullContent:
Study of quadrilaterals and their properties. Learn about different types of four-sided polygons.

Types of Quadrilaterals:
â€¢ Square (all sides equal, all angles 90Â°)
â€¢ Rectangle (opposite sides equal, all angles 90Â°)
â€¢ Parallelogram (opposite sides parallel and equal)
â€¢ Rhombus (all sides equal, opposite angles equal)
â€¢ Trapezoid (one pair of parallel sides)
â€¢ Kite (two pairs of adjacent sides equal)

title: Chapter 6: Distributive Property
content: Understanding the distributive property in algebra. Learn how to expand and factor expressions.
fullContent:
Understanding the distributive property in algebra. Learn how to expand and factor expressions.

Distributive Property:
â€¢ a(b + c) = ab + ac
â€¢ a(b - c) = ab - ac

Examples:
â€¢ 3(x + 2) = 3x + 6
â€¢ 2(5 - y) = 10 - 2y
â€¢ x(3 + 4) = 3x + 4x = 7x
subject: Mathematics

title: Chapter 7: Proportional Reasoning
content: Proportional reasoning and ratios. Learn to solve problems involving proportions and percentages.
fullContent:
Proportional reasoning and ratios. Learn to solve problems involving proportions and percentages.

Proportions:
â€¢ a/b = c/d
â€¢ Cross multiplication: ad = bc

Applications:

â€¢ Percentages
â€¢ Unit conversions
â€¢ Similar figures
